attr.title: Ghost Trap
attr.desc: You've died and landed in purgatory, your options? Unending suffering or finding a way back to your world. GHOST TRAP is a free-to-play indie platformer created by a solo student developer.
attr.inst: Download the game for free from Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game for free from [Steam](Download the game for free from Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder.) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.
